19 package com.webtrends.harness.component.cache.memory
20 
21 import com.webtrends.harness.component.cache.{CacheConfig, Cache}
22 import com.webtrends.harness.health.{ComponentState, HealthComponent}
23 import org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer
24 import scala.concurrent._
25 import scala.collection.mutable
26 
27 import scala.concurrent.duration.Duration
28 
29 /**
30  * In memory cache is exactly that, it stores values inside a standard HashMap. There are obviously
31  * issues with this approach, you wouldn't use it if you wanted the cache to be distributed or if the
32  * data became too large.
33  *
34  * It is a TTL cache that will default to 5 minutes until it expires elements.
35  */
36 case class TimedChannelBuffer(insertionTime:Long, buffer:ChannelBuffer)
37 
38 object MemoryManager {
39   val caches = mutable.Map[String, mutable.Map[String, TimedChannelBuffer]]()
40 }
41 
42 class MemoryManager(name:String) extends Cache(name) {
43 
44   def caches = MemoryManager.caches
45 
46   protected val DEFAULT_TTL = 75L
47 
48   import context.dispatcher
49 
50   protected val ttl = if (config.hasPath(s"$name.ttl")) {
51     Duration(config.getLong(s"$name.ttl"), "seconds")
52   } else {
53     Duration(DEFAULT_TTL, "seconds")
54   }
55 
56   private[this] val scheduler = context.system.scheduler
57   private[this] var taskRunning: Boolean = false
58 
59   private[this] def scheduleTimer() : Unit = synchronized {
60     require(!taskRunning)
61     taskRunning = true
62     scheduler.scheduleOnce(ttl)(() => timeout())
63   }
64 
65   private[this] def timeout() = {
66     synchronized {
67       removeExpiredItems()
68       taskRunning = false
69       if (caches.nonEmpty) scheduleTimer()
70     }
71   }
72 
73   private[this] def checkTimeout(insertionTime:Long) : Boolean = {
74     if (compat.Platform.currentTime - (ttl.toSeconds*1000) <= insertionTime) {
75       true
76     } else {
77       false
78     }
79   }
80 
81   private[this] def removeExpiredItems() = synchronized {
82     val cache = caches
83     val expired:mutable.Map[String, List[String]] = cache map {
84       nc =>
85         val expireList = mutable.MutableList[String]()
86         nc._2 foreach { cacheItem =>
87           if (checkTimeout(cacheItem._2.insertionTime)) {
88             expireList += cacheItem._1
89           }
90         }
91         nc._1 -> expireList.toList
92     }
93 
94     // we delete here so that we don't get any concurrent modification exceptions
95     expired foreach {
96       nc => nc._2 foreach { delete(nc._1, _) }
97     }
98   }
99 
100   /**
101    * Any logic to stop the component
102    */
103   override def stop = {
104     super.stop
105     caches.clear()
106   }
107 
108   override protected def get(namespace: String, key: String): Future[Option[ChannelBuffer]] = {
109     caches.get(namespace) match {
110       case Some(c) => Future {
111         c.get(key) match {
112           case Some(value) => Some(value.buffer)
113           case None => None
114         }
115       }
116       case None => Future { None }
117     }
118   }
119 
120   override protected def clear(namespace: String): Future[Boolean] = {
121     caches.get(namespace) match {
122       case Some(c) =>
123         c.clear()
124         Future { true }
125       case None => Future { false }
126     }
127   }
128 
129   // Not supported in in-memory cache
130   override protected def increment(namespace: String, key: String, incrementBy: Long): Future[Option[Long]] = ???
131 
132   // Not supported in in-memory cache
133   override protected def decrement(namespace: String, key: String, decrementBy: Long): Future[Option[Long]] = ???
134 
135   override protected def delete(namespace: String, key: String): Future[Boolean] = {
136     caches.get(namespace) match {
137       case Some(c) =>
138         c.remove(key)
139         Future { true }
140       case None =>
141         Future { false }
142     }
143   }
144 
145   override protected def contains(namespace: String, key: String): Future[Boolean] = {
146     caches.get(namespace) match {
147       case Some(c) => Future { c.contains(key) }
148       case None => Future { false }
149     }
150   }
151 
152   override protected def getHealth: Future[HealthComponent] =
153     Future { HealthComponent(self.path.name, ComponentState.NORMAL, "All Good, managing %d caches".format(caches.size)) }
154 
155   /**
156    * Creates a cache based on the implementer of the function. So could be any cache type
157    *
158    * @param config The
159    * @return true if created, false if already created
160    */
161   override protected def createCache(config: CacheConfig): Boolean = {
162     caches.get(config.namespace) match {
163       case Some(c) =>
164         false
165       case None =>
166         val cache = mutable.Map[String, TimedChannelBuffer]()
167         caches += (config.namespace -> cache)
168         true
169     }
170   }
171 
172   /**
173    * Deletes the cache from the in memory map
174    *
175    * @param namespace namespace for the cache you are deleting
176    * @return
177    */
178   override protected def deleteCache(namespace:String): Boolean = {
179     if (caches.contains(namespace)) {
180       caches.remove(namespace)
181       true
182     } else {
183       false
184     }
185   }
186 
187   override protected def add(namespace: String, key: String, value: ChannelBuffer): Future[Boolean] = {
188     caches.get(namespace) match {
189       case Some(c) =>
190         c.put(key, TimedChannelBuffer(compat.Platform.currentTime, value))
191         if (c.nonEmpty && !taskRunning) scheduleTimer()
192         Future { true }
193       case None => Future { false }
194     }
195   }
196 }

193 281 5844 - 5849 Literal <nosymbol> false
